trans-unit.source: Defines methods for reading the parts of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> and also for limited types of writing to the document.
trans-unit.target: 定义用于读取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> 的各个部件以及写入文档的有限类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to obtain a reference to an object that implements this interface.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何获取对实现此接口的对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader> to obtain an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader> collection in order to access each page in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader>获取<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader>若要访问在每一页的集合<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The definition that is added.
trans-unit.target: 添加的定义。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> 添加到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: Flushes the package <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and also commits an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> to the package.
trans-unit.target: 刷新包 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 并将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> 提交至包。

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based position of the document in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> 中的位置（从零开始）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that represents the document location in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示文档在序列中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see langword="DocumentStructure" /> part, if one exists, of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> 的 <see langword="DocumentStructure" /> 部件（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure" /> that represents the <see langword="DocumentStructure" /> element, if one exists, and its child elements.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure" />，表示 <see langword="DocumentStructure" /> 元素（如果存在）及其子元素。

trans-unit.source: An [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document does not need to have a Document Structure part.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档不需要拥有了一个文档结构部件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> readers, one reader for each page in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> 读取器的集合，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> 中的每一页对应一个读取器。

trans-unit.source: A collection of fixed page readers, one reader for each page in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 固定页读取器的集合，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> 中的每一页对应一个读取器。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader.FixedPages%2A> property to obtain an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader> collection in order to access the individual pages in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader.FixedPages%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader>才能访问中的各个页面集合<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the page.
trans-unit.target: 页的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reader for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> with the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 为具有指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> 获取读取器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader" /> for the page.
trans-unit.target: 页的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />, if one exists, that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that contains the default printing options for the document; or <see langword="null" /> if no print ticket exists for the document.
trans-unit.target: 包含文档的默认打印选项的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />；如果不存在文档的打印票证，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 2 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>属于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档，请参阅中的第 2 章[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。

trans-unit.source: The definition that is removed.
trans-unit.target: 已移除的定义。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> 中移除指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the signature definitions that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> 关联的所有签名定义的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of signature definitions, typically one for every person who signed or will sign the document.
trans-unit.target: 签名定义的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" />，通常已经或将要对文档进行签名的每个人对应一个。

trans-unit.source: Gets the thumbnail image, if a thumbnail exists, that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> 关联的缩略图像（如果存在缩略图）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> that represents the image.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示图像的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，表示文档的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader.Uri%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader.Uri%2A> 属性。
